name: magic-guard

effect.sun_moon: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
